body_html: I think the distinction makes sense as soon as you replicate a part of a network, but feed it different inputs. For example, if you want to re-input adversarial examples back into your network to train it to classify those correctly too, you want to reuse the variable scope of the original model, but put all your operations into a separate scope (at least if you want to inspect your graph at some point and want it to be structured)
